system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} in service to a mystic iron eater and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond} to train with them: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage}...

abilities.description: ...to ready yourself for a ritual by ingesting iron shavings and draw on its essence, roll +wits and add +1. On a hit, take +1 momentum.

...in combat by ingesting a pellet of iron and draw on its strength, roll +wits and add +1. On a hit, you may suffer -1 health and take +1 iron. If you do, you suffer -2 iron when the fight ends. Take +1 iron after the pellet leaves your body.

...by pressing an iron paste to your tongue and draw on its glamor, roll +wits and add +1. On a hit, take +1 momentum if the next move you make is @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel}.
